text:
Welcome to the celebrity feud we truly don't deserve but that Summer 2018 delivered to us anyway: Kanye West vs. Ryan Reynolds. We are not worthy!

For those of you wondering why there would ever be an issue between this unlikely pair, APPARENTLY Kanye West—a self-described Deadpool fan—thinks the movie copied his music.

To be clear, Deadpool 2 mostly consists of old hits like "We Belong" by Pat Benatar, and a Celine Dion original called "Ashes." Something Ryan Reynolds hopped on Twitter to point out.

Waiting for Celine Dion to comment like:
authors: Mehera Bonner Is A News Writer Who Focuses On Celebrities
title: Ryan Reynolds Iconically Claps Back at Kanye West for Saying 'Deadpool 2' Lifted His Music
